name: Spot The Defuser
description:
Spot The Defuser is a local cooperative game playable for 3 players and more!

The aim of the game is to defuse as much bombs as possible before the end of the timer.

To do it, you will have to communicate and describe what you see on your screen (without showing it to others!) and find who has different bomb.

The minority which have a different bomb have defuse button!
Press [DEFUSE], gain extra time and try to defuse next bomb!
